subject: Ebay auction for sorta Frank's Box?
author: Aquarius
full_text:
Hmmm... saw this on Ebay tonight... you've got to read all the text to hear
how he describes what he's selling. 

Do any of you on this list know who he is? I just thought this was kind of
interesting... see:

http://tinyurl.com/o5pper

Cheers,

Leslie, consistent lurker and occasional poster <g>

"I'm not happy, I'm cheerful. There's a difference. A happy woman has no
cares at all. A cheerful woman has cares but has learned how to deal with them."

    -- Beverly Sills (1929-) American Opera Singer
